Reviews.Title: HP PW460T is exceptionally crystal clear
Reviews.Author: Timmy
Reviews.Content: I love this touchscreen camera,period.It is very user friendly,the pictures come out very clear,it is very portable,and very easy to use.I am a huge fan of touchscreen technology,and I love this camera.I accidentally dropped my camera on the concrete floor at work,but no damage whatsoever...the camera still functions perfectly,and there's hardly a scratch on it.Also,the sound quality from the video shoots on this camera is awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this little gem!
Reviews.Author: Noorah101
Reviews.Content: I bought my very first digital camera about 6 years ago, and had not upgraded since.  Being very unfamiliar with the newest in digital cameras, the only thing I knew was that I wanted another HP.  After a bit of browsing on Amazon, I chose this one.  I absolutely love it!  It's VERY compact (way more than I expected), it takes great quality pictures and videos, and it's super easy to use.  The one thing I would mention, when unwrapping the product, is to tear apart ALL the plastic.  I almost threw away the instructions and CD that came with it, they were well hidden inside the hard plastic wrapping.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Diekastro
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, is lightweight, rechargeable battery is used, you smile and face detection, and resolution is very good ... I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: A true point and shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: ivysgramma
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after struggling and missing shots from my GE camera . The touchscreen menu is sooo much better than figuringout which button to push for menu options.  The pictures were clear and crisp. Not sure about how long the li-ion rechargablebattery last for picture taking so I just purchased a backup from amazon. The battery takes only 2 hours to recharge. Takes multiple pictures very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: A. Clark
Reviews.Content: I love the size, the ease of use and all the options available with this camera.  I've put it to good use already.  Very pleased with the quality!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE COLOR AND TOUCH SCREEN
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful looking camera. I was concerned the touch screen would be one of those that you have to keep pressing. It is so sensitive that a light touch is all you need to do. Love it!

Reviews.Title: HP camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Smith
Reviews.Content: Small so easy to carry.On screen links to walk you through what you want. It has a lot of options to choose from.Video and pictures are very good.I really like it!!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Clark
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. It's small and compact. The touch screen is pretty cool. I needed a camera to replace one to use for going out with friends and this camera is perfect. It has many different settings that are great. There's even a setting where it automatically takes a picture when a face is detected (great when you're trying to take pictures of yourself with a friend).

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: john gutowski
Reviews.Content: HP PW460T 12 MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch Touchscreen LCD (Purple)I just received this camera yesterday.I got it for my girlfriend for Christmas and i have to say that i am jealous.It is an amazing camera that takes the best quality pics of any camera i have ever owned.It's compact,easy to use and the best part...she is thrilled.Again...Awesome camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Touchscreen
Reviews.Author: f banks
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. I was expecting a good camera but, this is better than expected. I brought a touchscreen from Walmart for more money and it was crap. It arrived sooner that expected which was great hard to open from the plastic and when I took my 1st picture it was wonderful, nice and clear the vie do was nice and sharp and I did all of this without reading the instructions. It's very to use which is a plus. I have been taken pictures every day since I got this camera. And the camera I got from Walmart was returned the next day.

Reviews.Title: HP PW460T 12MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Gerald Williams "booklistener"
Reviews.Content: This camera is solid, metal frame, more features than I will ever use.  You have to understand I am a point and shoot kind of guy.  I still make my subjects squint into the sun. I do use the zoom and flash but that is about it.  I shot my grand children all day today at the park, at Mc Donalds in the play area and at home both indoors and out; about 240 pictures worth.  Not a bad shot in the bunch, clear, beautiful color, and all well lighted.  I had to read the manual to figure out the touch screen but I already have down those features I will use.  I don't connect the camera to the computer to download pictures; I take the card out of the camera, plug it into the computer and use drag and drop to organize.  The battery still shows full but I did order two extra so I will have them if I need them.  You do have to take the battery out of the camera to charge it; that is not an issue with me as I bought extra battries but may be for some.  This is my third digital camera; my first was an old Kodak 5000, big, clunky but weather proof.  I still keep it in my boat in the summer for fish pictures; it was a great camera in its day.  My second is an HP R707, about five years old and also a very good sturdy camera.  It too took very good pictures but a lot of blurry ones, not the cameras fault but mine, I am not steady. This new PW460T didn't have a blurry one in the bunch.I do take good care of my cameras, the Kodak has to be close to ten years old and still works fine and is still used.  I will keep the HP R707 as a back up but after using the much smaller and more featured PW460T wouldn't want to have to go back to it.If I encounter problems I will update this review; for now five stars all the way.*********IMPORTANT UPDATE*********Since I installed Media Impression, I have had my computer lock up when useing several programs and had others crash citing a "Missing MagCore.dll"  This is an ArcSoft file and the only ArcSoft software I installed was Media Impression.  I have not changed my review of the camera but the free virsion of Media Impression isn't as good as Windows Media Player.  Unless you plan to buy the full virsion don't load it and save yourself a lot of potential problems.  I run Windows 7; several Knowledge forums discuss this problem.

Reviews.Title: HP PW 460T digital camera
Reviews.Author: R. Hopkins
Reviews.Content: My cousin has a HP camera and recommended HP to me. Note: This is my very first camera of any kind.  I'm learning about this camera, photography, and editing all at the same time. Yes, I'm a little overwhelmed at this time. I do feel that this camera will allow me to grow into it. I have showed this camera to my cousin and he responded with, Hey, This is a very nice camera, Randy. So having said that, I'm off to the races with my mind and heart! I hope the learning curve isn't too difficult!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera :)
Reviews.Author: NurseGrad2012
Reviews.Content: If you hate small cameras don't get this one becaue its very compact but I am a female with small hands so it was perfect for me. I love the touch screen and I love the quality of photos. This camera has so many scene modes and it also retouches the photos and crops them. I love it! Only thing I don't love is when upload them on my. Hp mini it maes the file go blank on the camera and I get a blue screen. I don't knw what that's all about.. but it doesn't bother me that much. Very beautiful lavender color and snooth finish. :)

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: cmo
Reviews.Content: This powerful camera is packaged in a slim, lightweight  package.  Easy to learn, easy to operate. Looking for a good point-and-shoot with lots of useful features?  This is it.

Reviews.Title: great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Sushimike "Mike.C"
Reviews.Content: Got one for my gf as her x-mas present. She love it. The touch screen function and 12X mega pixel. She thought I paid $300 for it.. I kept her think that way. ha ha ha .. any way it is a great gift item for your love one. I certainly suggest this item.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: NAVY CHIEF "CHIEF"
Reviews.Content: A GREAT CAMERA.  WORKS GREAT...FITS EASILY IN SHIRT POCKETS.GRET RESOLUTION...AND GOOD PRICE. YOU CAN'T GO WRONG WITH THIS CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camara
Reviews.Author: tsl
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures. A little small to hold onto. Takes a little practice.I bought extra battery and memory card. good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Not happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Tracy Boulet
Reviews.Content: I had an HP photosmart camera that I loved but it was older and I wanted something newer -- I miss the old camera.  I don't like the battery at all -- it's constantly needs to be charged.  It was fully charged, I took it to see a Boston Bruins game and before the game ended my battery was dead.  And I have to take the battery out and recharge it.  My old camera, I just plugged the whole thing in.  I am not really impressed with the pictures -- some pictures are good but most of them are blurry or fuzzy or dark -- not user friendly at all.  Sorry

Reviews.Title: Great Camera But Bad Battery From Start
Reviews.Author: Laylene
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift, and it seemed to work fine for a few seconds until the battery which was not charged first died, so I plugged it in and left it to charge, I am not sure if it's the charger or the battery which is bad but something is not right and the battery will not charge. I am frustrated because this was ordered brand new from what I was told.

Reviews.Title: kivakay
Reviews.Author: Kay C. Kleiber
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife for her bithday. The camera is amazing. I have a canon and this one has fantastic clarity and simple operation. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Sorry I purchased this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Sheila Ancona
Reviews.Content: I had the HP touchscreen, loved it! The little plastic clip that held the battery in place, broke, I called HP and was told it cannot be repaired. I was told this was the closest model to replace it. I bought it and it is TERRIBLE! I am going to return it, would not hold a charge and I could not take any photos of our Maui vacation! Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: no estoy satisfecha
Reviews.Author: lis
Reviews.Content: muy linda la camara pero necesariamente hay que agregarle una memoria pues el paquete original no la trae y solo puedes tomar 3 fotos total que tuve que necesariamente comprarle una tarjeta pues no la trae

ProductInfo.Name: HP PW460T 12 MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch Touchscreen LCD (Purple)
